story.storykicker: Check out what the stars say your day will be like today.
story.storybody:
ARIES{mosimage}

Do what feels right in personal relationships without worrying much about other's opinions. An objective and honest look at situations and an overview of your life gives you the right perspective. Think big rather than settling for limitations and restrictions! Lucky number 21. Colour blue.

TAURUS{mosimage}

Your feelings influence you in whatever you do today. However, don't allow emotions to affect professional decisions. You are relaxed and wander into happy activity. It's important not to delude yourself or avoid looking at truths as emotions cloud your vision. Lucky number 8. Colour blue.

GEMINI{mosimage}

You are likely to travel and spend time in three places! Money matters take priority, as unexpected expenses have to be met. Wheels of activity are energized as you handle many situations simultaneously! Remain centered till you find an opportunity for change. Lucky number 3. Colour pink.

CANCER{mosimage}

Business opportunities seem to come unexpectedly from far-off places. You no longer need to be limited professionally, as new horizons open up. Personal relationships are wonderful as long as there are no restrictions. You get involved in group activity. Lucky number 17. Colour gray.

LEO{mosimage}

A pleasure trip or an outing rejuvenates your energy and relationships today. A special work assignment is short in duration but brings success. It's good to focus on priorities, values and relationships that are important or you could confuse yourself and others. Lucky number 6. Colour pink.

VIRGO{mosimage}

Your wisdom and professional expertise bring appreciation. Deep feelings in personal relationships are shared and expressed. A socially scintillating day as you make an impact on people you meet for the first time. A sentimental journey is on the cards!  Lucky number 4. Colour blue.

LIBRA{mosimage}

Pleasure is mixed with anxiety as you worry about business. You are likely to be more involved and focused in professional projects from now on. However, the pursuit of creative pastimes can be refreshing and energizing. Balance of the head and heart is needed. Lucky number 4. Colour yellow.

SCORPIO{mosimage}

You are generous and friendly but impatient of opposition. You share love, joy and laughter with a special person. Everything seems to be coming together in personal and professional aspects now, enjoy it and let the abundance overflow. Old friends drop in. Lucky number 5. Colour orange.

SAGITTARIUS{mosimage}

Accept challenges that life offers and keep going through ups and downs realizing that 'this too shall pass'. Change is the constant in life and one has to learn to flow with it. Enjoy every moment - the peak and the valley without getting addicted to it. Lucky number 6. Colour red.

CAPRICORN{mosimage}

You have the courage to stand up for values in relationships. You find new ways to express your creativity and remain individualistic and strong when faced with competition at work or opposition at home. Physical exercise or dancing can be therapeutic. Lucky number 6. Colour greens.

AQUARIUS{mosimage}

Your persistence and patience take you towards goals. Relationships change for the better and love blooms again, after you communicate and discuss problems. You organize an event to perfection and receive much appreciation. You enjoy goodwill and friendship. Lucky number 5. Colour brown.

PISCES{mosimage}

You tend to be impulsive when making important decisions and need to consider priorities. Your great sense of humour takes you smoothly through difficult situations. You are generous with friends. Relationships are loving but don't take them for granted. Lucky number 18. Colour yellow.
